long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This plugin is for use by CaterCow employees to easily complete DoorDash Drive orders. It's purpose is to take a CaterCow catering order and autofill the DoorDash Drive order page as there  is no public API. 

To use the plugin, go to the delivery tab of an order in CaterCow admin and click the "DoorDash This Order" button. This will open the DoorDash form. Now click the plugin in your toolbar to autofill all the relevant fields.  

The plugin fills in all relevant fields and calculates costs so that admins no longer have to copy/paste saving time.
